S1.name: Spirit:
S1.text: Look at all of these items, food, and traders!

S2.name: Spirit:
S2.text: The kingdom seems to be prospering! So many goods!

S3.name: Spirit:
S3.text: I have never seen so many vendors and traders.

S3.name: Spirit:
S3.text: The king is truly great, he must have personally had a  word with all of them.

M1.name: Spirit:
M1.text: There were so many here last week...

M2.name: Spirit:
M2.text: Why do people like us still try? There is nothing here, and no customers.

M3.name: Spirit:
M3.text: I heard that the king took all the items and food for himself! His greedy self!
